name: Boo Boo
description:
Created for the 2 Min Horror Jam 

CONTROLS: 

Attack - Left Mouse 

Block - Right Mouse

Most Interactions  - E

This actually is my first ever "game" and it was a fantastic learning experience. 

Thanks for taking the time to play.  Any feedback, outside of the really silly and stupid twist (if you can even call it that) would be really appreciated :)
